'''''Naku Weed Whacker (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 4 [[Electro Seelie]] on [[Watatsumi Island]] and [[Seirai Island]] in Inazuma.
